mapper.select: SELECT SCHDL_ID schdlId, SCHDL_NAME schdlName, SENDER sender, FILE_PATH filePath, SEND_GUBUN sendGubun, SEND_TYPE sendType, ACTIVE_YN activeYn FROM GS_SEND_SCHDL WHERE MASTER_SCHDL_ID = 0 AND SEND_TYPE = 'R_M' AND ACTIVE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT 'selectMailQueueMinMax', MIN(ID) queueMinId, MAX(ID) queueMaxId FROM GS_MAIL_QUEUE WHERE SCHDL_ID = ${schdlId} AND TARGET_YN = 'N' AND RESERVE_DATE < SYSDATE() LIMIT 100000

SELECT GMQ.ID queId, GSS.SCHDL_ID schdlId, GSS.MASTER_SCHDL_ID masterSchdlId, GSS.SCHDL_NAME schdlName, GSS.FILE_PATH filePath, GSS.SEND_GUBUN sendGubun, GSS.SEND_TYPE sendType, GSS.SEND_FLAG sendFlag, GSS.ACTIVE_YN activeYn, GSS.SENDER sender,
GMQ.RECEIVER receiver, GMQ.UUID uuid, GMQ.TITLE mailTitle, GMQ.CONTENTS mailContents, GMQ.MAP1 map1, GMQ.MAP2 map2, GMQ.MAP3 map3, GMQ.MAP4 map4, GMQ.MAP5 map5, GMQ.MAP6 map6, GMQ.MAP7 map7, GMQ.MAP8 map8, GMQ.MAP9 map9, GMQ.MAP10 map10, GMQ.TARGET_YN targetYn, GMQ.RESERVE_DATE reserveDate, GMQ.REG_DATE regDate FROM GS_SEND_SCHDL GSS INNER JOIN GS_MAIL_QUEUE GMQ ON (GSS.MASTER_SCHDL_ID = GMQ.SCHDL_ID) WHERE GSS.SEND_TYPE = 'R_S' AND GMQ.SCHDL_ID = ${schdlId} AND GMQ.TARGET_YN = 'Y' AND GMQ.RESERVE_DATE < SYSDATE() AND GSS.SCHDL_NAME = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d') AND GMQ.ID BETWEEN ${queueMinId} AND ${queueMaxId}
mapper.update: UPDATE GS_MAIL_QUEUE SET TARGET_YN = 'Y' WHERE ID BETWEEN ${queueMinId} AND ${queueMaxId} AND SCHDL_ID = ${schdlId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GS_SEND_QUE_RAW(SCHDL_ID, UUID, RECEIVER, SEND_GUBUN, REG_DATE) VALUES(${schdlId}, #{uuid}, #{receiver}, 'M', SYSDATE())

INSERT INTO GS_SEND_SCHDL(MASTER_SCHDL_ID, SCHDL_NAME, SENDER, FILE_PATH, SEND_GUBUN, SEND_TYPE, SEND_FLAG, ACTIVE_YN, RESERVE_DATE, REG_DATE) SELECT SCHDL_ID, DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), SENDER, FILE_PATH, SEND_GUBUN, 'R_S', '00', '-', SYSDATE(), SYSDATE() FROM GS_SEND_SCHDL WHERE SCHDL_ID = ${schdlId}
